book.title: Cat Cora in the Big City
book.style: black-and-white coloring page, kid-friendly, thick clean outlines, minimal detail, high contrast, no grayscale, no text
book.negative: color, grey, shading, gradients, tiny patterns, cluttered backgrounds, logos, watermarks, photorealism, text, numbers, letters, words
book.cover_prompt: Cat Cora with scarf standing on city street; tall buildings as simple blocks; sun circle above
book.back_blurb: Walk with Cat Cora through the busy big city full of friendly surprises!
